name: Chains & Chars: ChainLetterJam Edition
description:
How To Play:

  • Tap and hold on the screen to swing the ball around its closest pivot
  • Tap quickly to shorten the chain and get a speed boost
  • Collect all coins to beat the level

Note: This game is intended for mobile phones even though Unity doesn't technically support WebGL on mobile. A warning message will display but the game still runs fine on my iPhone.

Icon Attribution: finger by IcoMoon from the Noun Project
